> OOC: Ok, I cant do anything about the stealth and the violator 
shields,
> but as for the base's shields, I'm within their range. DrillBit 
drilled
> undernieth them. We were coming through the tunnel within the 
shields.

which means Drillbits shots would hit them if he was firing at the 
Violator. heh the violator was able to negate the shields before 
Prebon or whoever changed their energy flux's constantly.
